thing-type.label: Monoprice 44519 4 Zone Amplifier
thing-type.description: A Multi-zone Whole House Amplifier System

parameter.name: serialPort
parameter.label: Serial Port
parameter.description: Serial Port to Use for Connecting to the Monoprice Amplifier

parameter.name: host
parameter.label: Address
parameter.description: Host Name or IP Address of the Monoprice Amplifier or Serial over IP device

parameter.name: port
parameter.label: Port
parameter.description: Communication Port for Serial over IP connection to the Monoprice Amplifier (8080 for amps with built-in Serial over IP)

parameter.name: numZones
parameter.label: Number of Zones
parameter.description: Number of Zones on the Amplifier to Utilize in the Binding (Up to 12 Zones With 3 Amplifiers Connected Together)

parameter.name: pollingInterval
parameter.label: Polling Interval
parameter.description: Configures How Often to Poll the Amplifier to Check for Zone Updates (5-60; Default 15)

parameter.name: ignoreZones
parameter.label: Ignore Zones
parameter.description: (Optional) A Comma Seperated List of Zone Numbers That Will Ignore the 'All Zone' (Except All Off) Commands (ie: 1,6,10)

parameter.name: initialAllVolume
parameter.label: Initial All Volume
parameter.description: When 'All' Zones Are Activated, the Volume Will Reset to This Value (1-30; default 10) to Prevent Excessive Blaring of Sound ;)

parameter.name: inputLabel1
parameter.label: Source 1 Input Label
parameter.description: Friendly Name for the Input Source to Be Displayed in the UI (ie: Chromecast, Radio, CD, etc.)
